name: bitcoin-block
description: A Bitcoin block interface and decoder for JavaScript

scripts.test:node: (which polendina-node >& /dev/null && polendina-node bare-async test/node.js) || npx -p polendina polendina-node bare-async test/node.js
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:node && npm run test:browser

author: Rod <rod@vagg.org> (http://r.va.gg/)
